dc.title: U.S. Probation & Pretrial Services, District of N.H. :: Welcome
dc.description: It is the mission of the U.S. Probation and Pretrial Services Office for the District of New Hampshire, as a component of the federal judiciary responsible for community corrections, to provide protection to the citizens of New Hampshire and to assist in the fair administration of justice.
